data.message: Drake is a fool,  em dissed him so many time's and Drake doesn't even know it,  just like em murdered Wayne on BOTH songs he collaborated with subliminaly. replies.message: Dawg you should get urself a time travel machine cause you really stuck in the past, nobody nd i mean nobody will ever die as the best in music - its called a "trend" - now compare Eminem from the "Curtain close" nd compare eminem to the "Marshal nathers lp2" the nikka aint the same old - go fuck a gay dude cause your dick sucking is overated 👊 @Matt
